data.name: REIGN OVER
data.detailed_description:
Fight in Turn based strategy battles:


  • Raise an army from your faction units and other mercenaries: raiders, robots, mutants and more.
  • Discover synergies between specific units and powerful hero abilities.
  • Take advantage of different battlefield terrain and unit combinations.

Customize your hero:


  • Learn new combat abilities that can buff, damage or summon units.
  • Hunt down rare artifacts to equip them for stats or to sell them for profit.
  • Level up to increase attack damage, ability points, movement speed or other attributes.

Replace fallen heroes with other hero classes:


  • Warlords - rush into close combat and buff your troops.
  • Rangers - debuff and focus fire on the most dangerous enemy units.
  • Tacticians - sabotage armies from the back-line, using damaging tactical abilities.

Conquer new territories:


  • Discover new battlefields using the Random map generator.
  • Play hotseat matches with friends or AI opponents

FAQ:

Are there savage raiders with spiky armor and modified flamethrower cars? ✔️ Yes. Are there hordes of deadly robots with plasma pistols and laser rifles? ✔️ Yes. Are there acid spewing mutants with extra limbs and tentacles? ✔️ Yes. Are there elves, goblins and dragons? ❌ No, you killed them all in HoMM3 already. :)

data.short_description: Build a fortress, raise an army, conquer your rivals! Hire heroes, equip them with rare artifacts and master their special abilities. Capture buildings and resources to train units and hire mercenaries. Lead them to victory in turn based combat!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated, OpenGL 2.1+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: with OpenAL support
